div.p: Consider it kindly, if I have troubled you too long; the necessity of the cause compelled me. I bid greetings to the noble gentlemen, Mr. Gwalter, Mr. Pellican, Mr. Bibliander, and the other brothers. Help me with your prayers, dearest brothers. In Reutlingen, September 14, 1555.
I wish you would show that good man how large the book is, for which he is so greatly inflamed; I could have... a ball, if I had wished.
